sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均可表示"国会，议会"之意。
means: parliament ： 指英国或加拿大等国的议会，通常用大写形式。
congress ： 指美国等国的国会，也可指代表大会。

sentence.Network_en: The Estonian parliament has passed a resolution declaring the republic fully independent.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱沙尼亚议会已经通过了宣布共和国完全独立的决议。

sentence.Network_en: He said parliament and the process of democracy had been debased.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说议会和民主程序已遭贬值。

sentence.Network_en: Politicians say it could lead to a dissolution of parliament.
sentence.Network_cn: 政客们说这可能会导致议会解散。

长期国会（英语：Long Parliament）（Long Parliament）于1640年11月召开，事实证明与查理一世的关系和短期国会一样紧张。新 …
(3) 正面图案皆铸有该国的国会大楼（parliament building）(Parliament building)。（4）5令吉，此枚是纪念争取马来西亚脱离英国统治及独立的灵魂人物。
国会山(Parliament Hill)的卫兵交接仪式(Changing of the Guard)是北美地区唯一效仿英国白金汉宫的卫兵交接仪式。资源拜沃市场加拿.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French parlement 'speaking', from the verb parler

entry.def: The parliament of some countries, for example Britain, is the group of people who make or change its laws, and decide what policies the country should follow.

example.ex: Parliament today approved the policy, but it has not yet become law.
example.tran: 议会于今天批准了这项政策，但尚未成为法律。

entry.def: A particular parliament is a particular period of time in which a parliament is doing its work, between two elections or between two periods of holiday.

example.ex: The legislation is expected to be passed in the next parliament.
example.tran: 预计这项法案将在下一届议会中通过。

means.word_mean: 1. a legislative assembly in certain countries (e.g., Great Britain)
2. a card game in which you play your sevens and other cards in sequence in the same suit as their sevens; you win if you are the first to use all your cards

auth_sentence.content: Isn't that how Parliament's meant to work?
auth_sentence.res_content: Isn't that how Parliament's meant to work?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Isn't that how Parliament's meant to work?

auth_sentence.content: Parliament has to approve this before the president does.
auth_sentence.res_content: Parliament has to approve this before the president does.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Parliament has to approve this before the president does.

auth_sentence.content: We have had members of our parliament being killed.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have had members of our parliament being killed.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谈话, 说法, 用法
stems_affixes.word_buile: parl说话+ance表名词→n.谈话, 说法, 用法
parlia=parley[n.&v.和谈,会谈]+ment表名词→会谈状况,国会

Sentence.sentence: due to an unofficial quota system,women hold 45 percent of positions in the Swedish parliament.

sentences.en: The British Parliament consists of the House of Lords and the House of Commons.
sentences.cn: 英国议会由上院和下院组成。

sentences.en: Several new laws have been passed in the present parliament.
sentences.cn: 几项新法律已在本届议会上获得通过。

jushi.english: The parliament is divided on the question.
jushi.chinese: 在这个问题上议会里意见有分歧。

jushi.english: Several new laws have been passed in the present parliament.
jushi.chinese: 几项新法律已在本届议会上获得通过。

jushi.english: Parliament will debate the question tomorrow.
jushi.chinese: 议会明天将辩论这个问题。
